title: D5 Xiaodui season2
synopsis: Based on the game "Fifth Personality", 2d animation is used to restore the characteristics and funny stalks of each character in the game. All staff Xiao Fang Lian interprets the 5th personality and cute chaos, and voice actors in various dialects show the literary style of Xiehouyu. Start the fun of chasing and escaping in the absurd gothic style! (translated from bilibili)
